title: Presumed Security Ban Please Help

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Last night i went to jump on league , Logged in and was instantly kicked out and perma banned received a email that didnt state much , ( see picture below) I have never done anything to warrant a perma ban and with no communication from anyone i don't even know what i've been banned for ?
I did some looking at the rules and seems the ways to get perma banned are

Toxic
Elo boosting
Back charges
Security
I have not done any of the first 3 . Never been chat banned or anything like that so i assume it must be a security issue but then why is it taking so long for a response? You would think for an issue concerning the security of my account the handling of the situation would be fast and efficient but so far has been neither just a little p*ed off atm to be honest and any help would be greatly appreciated

Additional info

Summoner Name : Enzed Wolf
Ticket Request #  : REQUEST #29989670

Any other info needed i can post just not sure what else would be useful

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

For security reasons I went and edited out your username (which is something that should be kept private for security reasons).
You have already submitted a ticket which is all you can do in this case, since it is an account specific enquiry and we are unable to help you further on the boards. 

From now its basically a waiting game. 

Here are some guidelines for submitting a support ticket that will ensure the smoothest and fastest response possible: 
> Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient ♥
